en: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
hmr: A lungphûm chu tlâng inthiengahai chun a um a.

en: Jehovah loveth the gates of Zion More than all the dwellings of Jacob.
hmr: LALPA chun Zion kul kawtkhârhai chu, Jakobhai umna po po nêkin a ngaina lem a nih.

en: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. [Selah
hmr: Aw Pathien khawpui, I chungchâng thu ropuitakin an hril hlak a nih.

en: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon as among them that know me: Behold, Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia: This one was born there.
hmr: A mi hretuhai lai an ṭhang ve ti, Rahab le Babulon chungchâng thu hril ka tih; Philistin le Tura hi, Ethiopia le hin, en ta u; Hi mi hi chutaka pieng chu a nih.

en: Yea, of Zion it shall be said, This one and that one was born in her; And the Most High himself will establish her.
hmr: A nih, “Saw saw le, hi hi mi hi amaa pieng an na, Achunghnungtak ngei chun ama chu sukdet a tih,” ti Zion chungchâng thu chu hril an tih.

en: Jehovah will count, when he writeth up the peoples, This one was born there. [Selah
hmr: LALPAIN mi tin hming a ziek pha chun, “Hi mi hi chutaka pieng chu a nih,” tiin, tiem a tih.

en: They that sing as well as they that dance shall say, All my fountains are in thee.
hmr: Hlasaktuhaiin, lâmhai le chun, “Ka tuihnâr po po chu nangmaah a nih a um chu,” tîng an tih.
